3.0.0-beta.name: css-modules-require-hook
3.0.0-beta.description: A require hook to compile CSS Modules on the fly

scripts.build: babel lib --out-dir lib && babel preset.js --out-file preset.js
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_PATH=$(pwd)/test/tokens/node_modules babel-node --presets es2015 `npm bin`/isparta cover --report text --report html `npm bin`/_mocha -- --require test/setup.js --ui tdd test/*/*.js

4.2.0.name: css-modules-require-hook
4.2.0.description: A require hook to compile CSS Modules on the fly

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=$(pwd)/test/tokens/node_modules mocha --require test/setup.js --ui tdd test/*/*.js --compilers js:babel-register
